subject: Re: The Software Inferno - Convincing management of the benefits of unit tests
msgSnippet: ... I m in the *we* group too. But full of doubts if we re doing the right thing. ... Regards, Jan
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Simon Chappell" <simonpeterchappell@...>
wrote:
>
> On 10/3/06, Michael Feathers <mfeathers@...> wrote:
>
> > I think that the controversial part of this is that you'd call those
> > system tests "unit tests."
>
> Bravo. You have cut to the heart of the matter. Oh, and he was also
> basically suggesting that what *we* call unit tests were too low level
> to worry about.
>

I'm in the *we* group too. But full of doubts if we're doing the right
thing.


> Simon
>
> --
> simonpeter.org | simonpeter.com | techbook.info
>

Regards, Jan
